item.title: Buffering
item.description: Code - https://github.com/jerryhuang3/buffering Live - https://buffrng.herokuapp.com/ Chrome Extension ‚Üó Fitness tracking application with Chrome extension that degrades user internet experience if fitness goals are not met. Google Oauth integration for account creation and Google Fit API for user’s step count data. üí™ Tech Stack includes React with Semantic UI, Express, and Postgres üëç

item.title: ESPN Fantasy Basketball Tracker
item.description: Code - https://github.com/jerryhuang3/espn-fantasy-basketball-tracker Live - https://ourleague.herokuapp.com/ Fun app for my fantasy league. Made with React and Express using ESPN API. WIP

item.title: Walmark
item.description: Code - https://github.com/jerryhuang3/walmark Live - https://walmark.herokuapp.com Walmark is a user curated, resource wall that can help users organize and bookmark links. Built with Javascript, JQuery, Express, and Postgres.

item.title: Petfinder
item.description: Live - https://petfinder.netlify.com Simple frontend pet adoption app utilizing React hooks, effects, context, and portals. Made with React, Parcel, and Reach Router.

item.title: tinyChatr
item.description: Code - https://github.com/jerryhuang3/tinychatr Live - https://tinychatr.herokuapp.com Web application built with Node, React, and Webpack that enables users to chat and send images to each other.

item.title: tinyJungle
item.description: Code - https://github.com/jerryhuang3/tinyjungle E-Commerce application using Stripe for payments and built with Ruby on Rails.

item.title: tinyTweeter
item.description: Code - https://github.com/jerryhuang3/tinytweeter Live - https://tinytweeter.herokuapp.com Single page application Twitter clone built with Node, Express, and MongoDB

item.title: tinyApp
item.description: Code - https://github.com/jerryhuang3/tinyapp Live - https://lighthouselabs-tinyapp.herokuapp.com Web application built with Node and Express that allows users to shorten long URLs
